code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{blogService}from'../../services/blogService';import BlogPost from'./BlogPost';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlogList=()=>{const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchPosts=async()=>{const data=await blogService.getPosts();setPosts(data);};fetchPosts();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Blog"}),posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BlogPost,{post:post},post._id))]});};export default BlogList;
